text: The canton of Marck is an administrative division of the Pas-de-Calais department, in northern France. It was created at the French canton reorganisation which came into effect in March 2015. Its seat is in Marck. It consists of the following communes: #Audruicq #Guemps #Marck #Muncq-Nieurlet #Nortkerque #Nouvelle-Église #Offekerque #Oye-Plage #Polincove #Recques-sur- Hem #Ruminghem #Saint-Folquin #Saint-Omer-Capelle #Sainte-Marie-Kerque #Vieille-Église #Zutkerque ==References== Category:Cantons of Pas-de-Calais
title: Canton of Marck
